documentation.text:
@title Medicine (Simplified Batch Contract)
 @dev Data container for medicine batches. State managed strictly by SupplyChainLogic via delegatecall.

@dev Sets the batch status to an InTransit state.
 @notice Relies on SC to provide valid next status, transporter, destination and ensure valid start state.

@dev Sets the batch status upon confirmed receipt.
 @notice Relies on SC to provide valid next status, ensure receiver matches destination, and ensure valid start state.
@dev Sets the final ConsumedOrSold status. Requires AtCustomer state.
@dev Sets the Destroyed status. Cannot be called if already destroyed or consumed/sold.

devdoc.details: Data container for medicine batches. State managed strictly by SupplyChainLogic via delegatecall.

setConsumedOrSold().details: Sets the final ConsumedOrSold status. Requires AtCustomer state.

setDestroyed(bytes32).details: Sets the Destroyed status. Cannot be called if already destroyed or consumed/sold.

setInTransit(uint8,address,address).details: Sets the batch status to an InTransit state.

setReceived(uint8,address).details: Sets the batch status upon confirmed receipt.

devdoc.title: Medicine (Simplified Batch Contract)

setInTransit(uint8,address,address).notice: Relies on SC to provide valid next status, transporter, destination and ensure valid start state.

setReceived(uint8,address).notice: Relies on SC to provide valid next status, ensure receiver matches destination, and ensure valid start state.
